mapper.sql: id, admin_id, order_id, status, address_id, create_time,cancel_reason,shop_id
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from staff_distribution
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into staff_distribution (admin_id, order_id, status, address_id, create_time,cancel_reason,shop_id) values (#{adminId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addressId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, NOW(),#{cancelReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{shopId,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into staff_distribution
admin_id,
order_id,
status,
address_id,
create_time,
#{adminId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{addressId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.select: select sd.id, sd.admin_id, sd.order_id, sd.status, sd.address_id, sd.create_time,sd.cancel_reason,sd.shop_id,ad.phone as psPhone from staff_distribution as sd left join admin as ad on sd.admin_id=ad.id where order_id=#{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.update:
update staff_distribution
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
admin_id = #{record.adminId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
order_id = #{record.orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{record.status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address_id = #{record.addressId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
shop_id = #{record.shopId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update staff_distribution set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, admin_id = #{record.adminId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_id = #{record.orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{record.status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address_id = #{record.addressId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, cancel_reason = #{record.cancelReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shop_id = #{record.shopId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select * from((select count(1) as todayDpsNum from user_order where store_id=#{shopId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and DATE_FORMAT(order_time, '%Y-%m-%d')=DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') and `status`=3) as temp7, (select count(1) as todayWpsNum from staff_distribution where admin_id=#{adminId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d')=DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') and `status`=5) as temp,
(select count(1) as weekWpsNum from staff_distribution where admin_id=#{adminId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and DATE_FORMAT((select date_sub(now(),interval 1 week)),'%Y-%m-%d') < DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d')and DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d')<=DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') and `status`=5) as temp1,
(select count(1) as monthWpsNum from staff_distribution where admin_id=#{adminId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and DATE_FORMAT((select date_sub(now(),interval 1 month)),'%Y-%m-%d') < DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d')and DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d')<=DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') and `status`=5) as temp2,
(select count(1) as todayDfjNum from user_order where store_id=#{shopId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and DATE_FORMAT(order_time, '%Y-%m-%d')=DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') and `status`=1) as temp3,
(select count(1) as todayWfjNum from staff_sorting where admin_id=#{adminId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d')=DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') and `status`=3) as temp4,
(select count(1) as weekWfjNum from staff_sorting where admin_id=#{adminId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and DATE_FORMAT((select date_sub(now(),interval 1 week)),'%Y-%m-%d') < DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d')and DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d')<=DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') and `status`=3) as temp5,
(select count(1) as monthWfjNum from staff_sorting where admin_id=#{adminId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and DATE_FORMAT((select date_sub(now(),interval 1 month)),'%Y-%m-%d') < DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d')and DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d')<=DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') and `status`=3) as temp6)
